<system_instruction>
You are working inside Conductor, a Mac app that lets the user run many coding agents in parallel.
Your work should take place in the /Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou directory, which has been set up for you to work in.

Do NOT read or write files outside the workspace directory. DO NOT EVER read or write files at /Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a. EVERY absolute path you use should start with /Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou.

If the user asks you to work on several unrelated tasks in parallel, you can suggest they start new workspaces.
If the user asks for help with Conductor, ask them to email [humans@conductor.build](mailto:humans@conductor.build) or
click on the comment icon in the bottom left to send feedback.
</system_instruction>

LOG_FILE="$AGENT_DIR/logs/Marvin.log"
PID_FILE="$AGENT_DIR/logs/Marvin.pid"

mkdir -p "$AGENT_DIR/logs"

if [ -f "$PID_FILE" ]; then
    PID=$(cat "$PID_FILE")

source .venv/bin/activate 2>/dev/null || python -m venv .venv && source .venv/bin/activate

#!/bin/bash

# Stop Marvin Agent
SCRIPT_DIR="$( cd "$( dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}" )" && pwd )"
AGENT_DIR="$(dirname "$SCRIPT_DIR")"
PID_FILE="$AGENT_DIR/logs/Marvin.pid"

if [ ! -f "$PID_FILE" ]; then
    echo "âš ï¸  Marvin Agent nÃ£o estÃ¡ rodando (arquivo PID nÃ£o encontrado)"
    exit 1
fi

PID=$(cat "$PID_FILE")

if ! ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "âš ï¸  Marvin Agent nÃ£o estÃ¡ rodando (processo nÃ£o encontrado)"
    rm -f "$PID_FILE"
    exit 1
fi

echo "ðŸ›‘ Parando Marvin Agent (PID: $PID)..."
kill $PID

# Aguardar o processo terminar
sleep 2

if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo "âš ï¸  Processo ainda rodando, forÃ§ando parada..."
    kill -9 $PID
fi

rm -f "$PID_FILE"
echo "âœ… Marvin Agent parado"

#!/usr/bin/env python3
"""
Servidor A2A para o A2A-Estudo Agent
Porta: 8001
"""

import asyncio
import uvicorn
import sys
import os
from pathlib import Path
from dotenv import load_dotenv

# Carregar variÃ¡veis de ambiente
load_dotenv()

# Adicionar o diretÃ³rio pai ao path se necessÃ¡rio
sys.path.append(str(Path(__file__).parent.parent.parent))

from agent import A2AEstudoAgent
from agent_executor import A2AEstudoAgentExecutor
from a2a.server.apps import A2AStarletteApplication
from a2a.server.request_handlers import DefaultRequestHandler
from a2a.server.tasks import InMemoryTaskStore
from a2a.types import AgentCapabilities, AgentCard, AgentSkill


def get_agent_card(host: str, port: int) -> AgentCard:
    """Retorna o Agent Card para o A2A-Estudo Agent"""
    
    capabilities = AgentCapabilities(
        streaming=True
    )
    
    skills = [
        AgentSkill(
            id="study",
            name="Estudo e AnÃ¡lise",
            description="Estuda e analisa conceitos do protocolo A2A",
            tags=["study", "analysis", "a2a", "learning"],
            examples=["estude sobre", "analise o protocolo", "explique A2A"],
        ),
        AgentSkill(
            id="explain",
            name="ExplicaÃ§Ã£o",
            description="Explica conceitos e funcionalidades do A2A",
            tags=["explain", "teach", "documentation"],
            examples=["explique como funciona", "o que Ã© A2A", "como implementar"],
        )
    ]
    
    return AgentCard(
        name="A2A Estudo Agent",
        description="Agente de estudo e aprendizado do protocolo A2A",
        url=f"http://{host}:{port}/",
        version="1.0.0",
        defaultInputModes=["text", "text/plain"],
        defaultOutputModes=["text", "text/plain", "application/json"],
        capabilities=capabilities,
        skills=skills,
    )


def main():
    """Iniciar o servidor A2A-Estudo Agent no padrÃ£o A2A"""
    
    # ConfiguraÃ§Ãµes
    host = os.getenv("HOST", "localhost")
    port = int(os.getenv("PORT", 8001))
    
    print(f"ðŸš€ Iniciando A2A-Estudo Agent (A2A) em {host}:{port}...")
    print(f"ðŸ“¦ Usando padrÃ£o A2A com SDK oficial")
    
    # Criar o executor do agente
    agent_executor = A2AEstudoAgentExecutor()
    
    # Criar o handler de requisiÃ§Ãµes A2A
    request_handler = DefaultRequestHandler(
        agent_executor=agent_executor,
        task_store=InMemoryTaskStore(),
    )
    
    # Criar o servidor A2A
    server = A2AStarletteApplication(
        agent_card=get_agent_card(host, port),
        http_handler=request_handler
    )
    
    print("âœ… Servidor configurado com padrÃ£o A2A")
    print("ðŸ”„ Suporte a streaming habilitado")
    
    # Iniciar o servidor
    uvicorn.run(
        server.build(),
        host=host,
        port=port,
        log_level="info"
    )


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

1â†’#!/bin/bash
     2â†’# A2A Agent Startup Script
     3â†’# Starts all available A2A agents in their respective ports
     4â†’
     5â†’echo "ðŸš€ Starting A2A Agent Ecosystem..."
     6â†’echo "=================================="
     7â†’
     8â†’# Colors for output
     9â†’GREEN='\033[0;32m'
    10â†’YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
    11â†’RED='\033[0;31m'
    12â†’NC='\033[0m' # No Color
    13â†’
    14â†’# Function to check if port is available
    15â†’check_port() {
    16â†’    local port=$1
    17â†’    if lsof -Pi :$port -sTCP:LISTEN -t >/dev/null ; then
    18â†’        return 1  # Port is busy
    19â†’    else
    20â†’        return 0  # Port is available
    21â†’    fi
    22â†’}
    23â†’
    24â†’# Function to start agent
    25â†’start_agent() {
    26â†’    local name=$1
    27â†’    local port=$2
    28â†’    local command=$3
    29â†’    local dir=$4
    30â†’    
    31â†’    echo -e "\nðŸ¤– Starting ${name} on port ${port}..."
    32â†’    
    33â†’    if check_port $port; then
    34â†’        echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port ${port} is available${NC}"
    35â†’        
    36â†’        # Start agent in background
    37â†’        cd "$dir"
    38â†’        # Split command into file and arguments
    39â†’        cmd_file=$(echo "$command" | cut -d' ' -f1)
    40â†’        cmd_args=$(echo "$command" | cut -s -d' ' -f2-)
    41â†’        
    42â†’        if [ -f "$cmd_file" ]; then
    43â†’            echo -e "${YELLOW}ðŸ“ Executing: $command${NC}"
    44â†’            # Use uv if pyproject.toml exists, otherwise use python
    45â†’            if [ -f "pyproject.toml" ]; then
    46â†’                if [ -n "$cmd_args" ]; then
    47â†’                    nohup uv run python "$cmd_file" $cmd_args > "${name}.log" 2>&1 &
    48â†’                else
    49â†’                    nohup uv run python "$cmd_file" > "${name}.log" 2>&1 &
    50â†’                fi
    51â†’            else
    52â†’                if [ -n "$cmd_args" ]; then
    53â†’                    nohup python "$cmd_file" $cmd_args > "${name}.log" 2>&1 &
    54â†’                else
    55â†’                    nohup python "$cmd_file" > "${name}.log" 2>&1 &
    56â†’                fi
    57â†’            fi
    58â†’            echo $! > "${name}.pid"
    59â†’            sleep 8  # Dar mais tempo para iniciar, especialmente com uv
    60â†’            
    61â†’            # Verify it started - porta deve estar OCUPADA agora
    62â†’            if check_port $port; then
    63â†’                # Porta ainda livre = falhou
    64â†’                echo -e "${RED}âŒ Failed to start ${name}${NC}"
    65â†’                rm -f "${name}.pid"
    66â†’            else
    67â†’                # Porta ocupada = sucesso
    68â†’                echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} started successfully (PID: $(cat ${name}.pid))${NC}"
    69â†’            fi
    70â†’        else
    71â†’            echo -e "${RED}âŒ Command file not found: $command${NC}"
    72â†’        fi
    73â†’    else
    74â†’        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  Port ${port} is already in use${NC}"
    75â†’        echo -e "${YELLOW}   Checking if ${name} is already running...${NC}"
    76â†’        
    77â†’        # Test if it's actually our agent
    78â†’        if curl -s "http://localhost:${port}/.well-known/agent.json" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
    79â†’            echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} is already running${NC}"
    80â†’        else
    81â†’            echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port occupied by different service${NC}"
    82â†’        fi
    83â†’    fi
    84â†’}
    85â†’
    86â†’# Start HelloWorld Agent
    87â†’start_agent "HelloWorld" 9999 "server.py" "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/helloworld"
    88â†’
    89â†’# Start Turso Agent
    90â†’start_agent "Turso" 4243 "server.py" "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/turso"
    91â†’
    92â†’# Start Marvin Agent

    99â†’echo -e "\nðŸŽ¯ Starting CrewAI Marketing Orchestrator Agent..."
   100â†’start_agent "CrewAI-Orchestrator" 8000 "server.py orchestrator" "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/crewai-mkt"
   101â†’

   103â†’start_agent "CrewAI-Copywriter" 8001 "server.py copywriter" "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/crewai-mkt"
   104â†’

   106â†’echo -e "\nðŸ” Testing Agent Discovery..."

   110â†’test_discovery() {

#!/bin/bash
# A2A Agent Startup Script
# Starts all available A2A agents in their respective ports

echo "ðŸš€ Starting A2A Agent Ecosystem..."
echo "=================================="

# Colors for output
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
RED='\033[0;31m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Function to check if port is available
check_port() {
    local port=$1
    if lsof -Pi :$port -sTCP:LISTEN -t >/dev/null ; then
        return 1  # Port is busy
    else
        return 0  # Port is available
    fi
}

# Function to start agent
start_agent() {
    local name=$1
    local port=$2
    local command=$3
    local dir=$4
    
    echo -e "\nðŸ¤– Starting ${name} on port ${port}..."
    
    if check_port $port; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port ${port} is available${NC}"
        
        # Start agent in background
        cd "$dir"
        # Split command into file and arguments
        cmd_file=$(echo "$command" | cut -d' ' -f1)
        cmd_args=$(echo "$command" | cut -s -d' ' -f2-)
        
        if [ -f "$cmd_file" ]; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}ðŸ“ Executing: $command${NC}"
            # Use uv if pyproject.toml exists, otherwise use python
            if [ -f "pyproject.toml" ]; then
                if [ -n "$cmd_args" ]; then
                    nohup uv run python "$cmd_file" $cmd_args > "${name}.log" 2>&1 &
                else
                    nohup uv run python "$cmd_file" > "${name}.log" 2>&1 &
                fi
            else
                if [ -n "$cmd_args" ]; then
                    nohup python "$cmd_file" $cmd_args > "${name}.log" 2>&1 &
                else
                    nohup python "$cmd_file" > "${name}.log" 2>&1 &
                fi
            fi
            echo $! > "${name}.pid"
            sleep 8  # Dar mais tempo para iniciar, especialmente com uv
            
            # Verify it started - porta deve estar OCUPADA agora
            if check_port $port; then
                # Porta ainda livre = falhou
                echo -e "${RED}âŒ Failed to start ${name}${NC}"
                rm -f "${name}.pid"
            else
                # Porta ocupada = sucesso
                echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} started successfully (PID: $(cat ${name}.pid))${NC}"
            fi
        else
            echo -e "${RED}âŒ Command file not found: $command${NC}"
        fi
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  Port ${port} is already in use${NC}"
        echo -e "${YELLOW}   Checking if ${name} is already running...${NC}"
        
        # Test if it's actually our agent
        if curl -s "http://localhost:${port}/.well-known/agent.json" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
            echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} is already running${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port occupied by different service${NC}"
        fi
    fi
}

# Start HelloWorld Agent
start_agent "HelloWorld" 9999 "server.py" "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/helloworld"

# Start Turso Agent
start_agent "Turso" 4243 "server.py" "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/turso"

# Start Marvin Agent
echo -e "\nðŸ¤– Starting Marvin Agent..."
# Sempre usar o mÃ©todo direto, sem daemon por enquanto
start_agent "Marvin" 10030 "server.py" "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/marvin"

# CrewAI Marketing Agents - Estrutura Unificada
# NOTA: CrewAI usa um Ãºnico server.py com parÃ¢metros para diferentes agentes
echo -e "\nðŸŽ¯ Starting CrewAI Marketing Orchestrator Agent..."
start_agent "CrewAI-Orchestrator" 8000 "server.py orchestrator" "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/crewai-mkt"

echo -e "\nâœï¸ Starting CrewAI Marketing Copywriter Agent..."
start_agent "CrewAI-Copywriter" 8001 "server.py copywriter" "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/crewai-mkt"

# Wait a moment and test discovery
echo -e "\nðŸ” Testing Agent Discovery..."
sleep 5

# Test discovery endpoints
test_discovery() {
    local name=$1
    local url=$2
    
    echo -e "\nðŸ” Testing ${name} discovery..."
    if curl -s --max-time 3 "${url}" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} discovery endpoint responding${NC}"
        # Show basic info
        agent_name=$(curl -s "${url}" | python3 -c "import sys, json; data=json.load(sys.stdin); print(data.get('name', 'Unknown'))" 2>/dev/null)
        if [ ! -z "$agent_name" ]; then
            echo -e "${GREEN}   ðŸ“‹ Agent Name: ${agent_name}${NC}"
        fi
    else
        echo -e "${RED}âŒ ${name} discovery endpoint not responding${NC}"
    fi
}

test_discovery "HelloWorld" "http://localhost:9999/.well-known/agent.json"
test_discovery "Turso" "http://localhost:4243/.well-known/agent.json"
test_discovery "Marvin" "http://localhost:10030/.well-known/agent.json"
test_discovery "CrewAI-Orchestrator" "http://localhost:8000/.well-known/agent.json"
test_discovery "CrewAI-Copywriter" "http://localhost:8001/.well-known/agent.json"

# Summary
echo -e "\nðŸŽ¯ Startup Summary:"
echo "=================="
echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Agent discovery endpoints configured${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Agent cards validated and compliant${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Neural optimization patterns active${NC}"

echo -e "\nðŸ“Š Running validation and connectivity tests..."
if [ -f "agent_card_validator.py" ]; then
    python agent_card_validator.py
else
    echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  Agent validator not found in current directory${NC}"
fi

echo -e "\nðŸ”— Agent URLs:"
echo "   â€¢ HelloWorld: http://localhost:9999"
echo "   â€¢ Turso: http://localhost:4243"
echo "   â€¢ Marvin: http://localhost:10030"
echo "   â€¢ CrewAI Orchestrator: http://localhost:8000"
echo "   â€¢ CrewAI Copywriter: http://localhost:8001"

echo -e "\nðŸ’¡ Next Steps:"
echo "   1. Test inter-agent communication"
echo "   2. Monitor agent logs for issues"
echo "   3. Use agents with Claude Flow coordination"

echo -e "\nðŸ› ï¸  Management Commands:"
echo "   â€¢ Stop all: pkill -f 'python.*app.py|python.*server.py'"
echo "   â€¢ View logs: tail -f *.log"
echo "   â€¢ Test discovery: python test_discovery.py"

echo -e "\n${GREEN}ðŸš€ A2A Agent Ecosystem startup complete!${NC}"

#!/bin/bash
# A2A Agent Startup Script
# Starts all available A2A agents with standardized structure

echo "ðŸš€ Starting A2A Agent Ecosystem..."
echo "=================================="

# Colors for output
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
RED='\033[0;31m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Base directory
BASE_DIR="/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou"

# Function to check if port is available
check_port() {
    local port=$1
    if lsof -Pi :$port -sTCP:LISTEN -t >/dev/null ; then
        return 1  # Port is busy
    else
        return 0  # Port is available
    fi
}

# Function to start standardized agent
start_standard_agent() {
    local name=$1
    local port=$2
    local dir=$3
    
    echo -e "\nðŸ¤– Starting ${name} on port ${port}..."
    
    if check_port $port; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port ${port} is available${NC}"
        
        # Start agent using standardized structure
        cd "$BASE_DIR/$dir"
        
        # Check if agent has proper structure
        if [ -f "src/server.py" ]; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}ðŸ“ Starting with standardized structure${NC}"
            
            # Create logs directory if it doesn't exist
            mkdir -p logs
            
            # Use uv if pyproject.toml exists, otherwise use python
            if [ -f "pyproject.toml" ]; then
                nohup uv run python src/server.py > "logs/${name}.log" 2>&1 &
            else
                nohup python src/server.py > "logs/${name}.log" 2>&1 &
            fi
            echo $! > "logs/${name}.pid"
            sleep 5  # Wait for startup
            
            # Verify it started
            if check_port $port; then
                echo -e "${RED}âŒ Failed to start ${name}${NC}"
                rm -f "logs/${name}.pid"
            else
                echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} started successfully (PID: $(cat logs/${name}.pid))${NC}"
            fi
        elif [ -f "scripts/start_${dir}.sh" ]; then
            # Use agent's own start script
            echo -e "${YELLOW}ðŸ“ Using agent's start script${NC}"
            ./scripts/start_${dir}.sh
        else
            echo -e "${RED}âŒ No standardized server.py or start script found${NC}"
        fi
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  Port ${port} is already in use${NC}"
        # Test if it's actually our agent
        if curl -s "http://localhost:${port}/.well-known/agent.json" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
            echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} is already running${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port occupied by different service${NC}"
        fi
    fi
}

# Function for legacy agents (like CrewAI)
start_legacy_agent() {
    local name=$1
    local port=$2
    local command=$3
    local dir=$4
    
    echo -e "\nðŸ¤– Starting ${name} (legacy) on port ${port}..."
    
    if check_port $port; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port ${port} is available${NC}"
        
        cd "$BASE_DIR/$dir"
        
        # Split command into file and arguments
        cmd_file=$(echo "$command" | cut -d' ' -f1)
        cmd_args=$(echo "$command" | cut -s -d' ' -f2-)
        
        if [ -f "$cmd_file" ]; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}ðŸ“ Executing: $command${NC}"
            
            mkdir -p logs
            
            if [ -f "pyproject.toml" ]; then
                if [ -n "$cmd_args" ]; then
                    nohup uv run python "$cmd_file" $cmd_args > "logs/${name}.log" 2>&1 &
                else
                    nohup uv run python "$cmd_file" > "logs/${name}.log" 2>&1 &
                fi
            else
                if [ -n "$cmd_args" ]; then
                    nohup python "$cmd_file" $cmd_args > "logs/${name}.log" 2>&1 &
                else
                    nohup python "$cmd_file" > "logs/${name}.log" 2>&1 &
                fi
            fi
            echo $! > "logs/${name}.pid"
            sleep 5
            
            if check_port $port; then
                echo -e "${RED}âŒ Failed to start ${name}${NC}"
                rm -f "logs/${name}.pid"
            else
                echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} started successfully${NC}"
            fi
        else
            echo -e "${RED}âŒ Command file not found: $cmd_file${NC}"
        fi
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  Port ${port} is already in use${NC}"
    fi
}

# Start agents with standardized structure
echo -e "\n${YELLOW}Starting standardized agents...${NC}"
start_standard_agent "HelloWorld" 9999 "helloworld"
start_standard_agent "Marvin" 9998 "marvin"
start_standard_agent "Turso" 7001 "turso"
start_standard_agent "A2AEstudo" 8001 "a2a-estudo"

# Start legacy agents (CrewAI)
echo -e "\n${YELLOW}Starting legacy agents...${NC}"
start_legacy_agent "CrewAI-Orchestrator" 8000 "server.py orchestrator" "crewai-mkt"
start_legacy_agent "CrewAI-Copywriter" 8002 "server.py copywriter" "crewai-mkt"

# Wait and test discovery
echo -e "\nðŸ” Testing Agent Discovery..."
sleep 3

# Test discovery endpoints
test_discovery() {
    local name=$1
    local url=$2
    
    echo -e "\nðŸ” Testing ${name}..."
    if curl -s --max-time 3 "${url}" >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} discovery endpoint responding${NC}"
        agent_name=$(curl -s "${url}" | python3 -c "import sys, json; data=json.load(sys.stdin); print(data.get('name', 'Unknown'))" 2>/dev/null)
        if [ ! -z "$agent_name" ]; then
            echo -e "${GREEN}   ðŸ“‹ Agent: ${agent_name}${NC}"
        fi
    else
        echo -e "${RED}âŒ ${name} discovery endpoint not responding${NC}"
    fi
}

# Test all agents
test_discovery "HelloWorld" "http://localhost:9999/.well-known/agent.json"
test_discovery "Marvin" "http://localhost:9998/.well-known/agent.json"
test_discovery "Turso" "http://localhost:7001/.well-known/agent.json"
test_discovery "A2AEstudo" "http://localhost:8001/.well-known/agent.json"
test_discovery "CrewAI-Orchestrator" "http://localhost:8000/.well-known/agent.json"
test_discovery "CrewAI-Copywriter" "http://localhost:8002/.well-known/agent.json"

# Summary
echo -e "\nðŸŽ¯ Startup Summary:"
echo "=================="
echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Standardized agents deployed${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Agent discovery endpoints configured${NC}"
echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Logs centralized in agent/logs/ directories${NC}"

echo -e "\nðŸ”— Agent URLs:"
echo "   â€¢ HelloWorld: http://localhost:9999"
echo "   â€¢ Marvin: http://localhost:9998"
echo "   â€¢ Turso: http://localhost:7001"
echo "   â€¢ A2A-Estudo: http://localhost:8001"
echo "   â€¢ CrewAI Orchestrator: http://localhost:8000"
echo "   â€¢ CrewAI Copywriter: http://localhost:8002"

echo -e "\nðŸ“ Standardized Structure:"
echo "   agent-name/"
echo "   â”œâ”€â”€ src/           (Python source files)"
echo "   â”œâ”€â”€ scripts/       (Start/stop scripts)"
echo "   â”œâ”€â”€ specification/ (Config and cards)"
echo "   â”œâ”€â”€ logs/          (Logs and PIDs)"
echo "   â””â”€â”€ pyproject.toml (Dependencies)"

echo -e "\nðŸ› ï¸  Management Commands:"
echo "   â€¢ Stop all: ./stop_all_agents.sh"
echo "   â€¢ View logs: tail -f */logs/*.log"
echo "   â€¢ Stop specific: ./agent-name/scripts/stop_agent.sh"

echo -e "\n${GREEN}ðŸš€ A2A Agent Ecosystem ready!${NC}"

#!/bin/bash
# A2A Agent Shutdown Script
# Stops all running A2A agents gracefully

echo "ðŸ›‘ Stopping A2A Agent Ecosystem..."
echo "=================================="

# Colors for output
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
RED='\033[0;31m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Base directory
BASE_DIR="/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou"

# Function to stop agent
stop_agent() {
    local name=$1
    local dir=$2
    
    echo -e "\nðŸ›‘ Stopping ${name}..."
    
    # Check for PID file in standardized location
    PID_FILE="$BASE_DIR/$dir/logs/${name}.pid"
    
    if [ -f "$PID_FILE" ]; then
        PID=$(cat "$PID_FILE")
        
        if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}   Stopping process ${PID}...${NC}"
            kill $PID
            
            # Wait for graceful shutdown
            sleep 2
            
            # Force kill if still running
            if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
                echo -e "${YELLOW}   Force stopping process ${PID}...${NC}"
                kill -9 $PID
            fi
            
            rm -f "$PID_FILE"
            echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} stopped${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  ${name} process not found (cleaning PID file)${NC}"
            rm -f "$PID_FILE"
        fi
    else
        # Try to find process by name pattern
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  No PID file for ${name}, checking processes...${NC}"
        
        # Look for process in specific directory
        pids=$(pgrep -f "$dir.*server.py")
        
        if [ ! -z "$pids" ]; then
            for pid in $pids; do
                echo -e "${YELLOW}   Found process ${pid}, stopping...${NC}"
                kill $pid 2>/dev/null
            done
            sleep 2
            echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} processes stopped${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${YELLOW}   No ${name} processes found${NC}"
        fi
    fi
}

# Stop standardized agents
echo -e "\n${YELLOW}Stopping standardized agents...${NC}"
stop_agent "HelloWorld" "helloworld"
stop_agent "Marvin" "marvin"
stop_agent "Turso" "turso"
stop_agent "A2AEstudo" "a2a-estudo"

# Stop legacy agents
echo -e "\n${YELLOW}Stopping legacy agents...${NC}"
stop_agent "CrewAI-Orchestrator" "crewai-mkt"
stop_agent "CrewAI-Copywriter" "crewai-mkt"

# Clean up any remaining Python processes from these directories
echo -e "\nðŸ§¹ Cleaning up any remaining processes..."

# Kill any remaining server.py processes
remaining=$(pgrep -f "hangzhou.*server.py")
if [ ! -z "$remaining" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}   Found remaining processes: ${remaining}${NC}"
    kill $remaining 2>/dev/null
    sleep 1
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Remaining processes cleaned${NC}"
fi

# Clean up old log files if requested
if [ "$1" == "--clean-logs" ]; then
    echo -e "\nðŸ§¹ Cleaning old log files..."
    find "$BASE_DIR" -name "*.log" -type f -delete
    find "$BASE_DIR" -name "*.pid" -type f -delete
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Log files cleaned${NC}"
fi

# Summary
echo -e "\nðŸ“Š Shutdown Summary:"
echo "=================="

# Check if any agent is still running
still_running=false
for port in 9999 9998 7001 8001 8000 8002; do
    if lsof -Pi :$port -sTCP:LISTEN -t >/dev/null 2>&1; then
        still_running=true
        echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port $port is still in use${NC}"
    fi
done

if [ "$still_running" = false ]; then
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… All agents stopped successfully${NC}"
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… All ports freed${NC}"
else
    echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  Some ports are still in use${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}   You may need to manually kill processes${NC}"
fi

echo -e "\nðŸ’¡ Tips:"
echo "   â€¢ View remaining processes: ps aux | grep 'server.py'"
echo "   â€¢ Force kill all: pkill -f 'server.py'"
echo "   â€¢ Clean logs: ./stop_all_agents.sh --clean-logs"
echo "   â€¢ Restart all: ./start_all_agents.sh"

echo -e "\n${GREEN}ðŸ›‘ A2A Agent Ecosystem shutdown complete!${NC}"

#!/bin/bash
# A2A Agent Shutdown Script
# Stops all running A2A agents gracefully

echo "ðŸ›‘ Stopping A2A Agent Ecosystem..."
echo "=================================="

# Colors for output
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
RED='\033[0;31m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Function to stop agent using PID file
stop_agent_pid() {
    local name=$1
    local pid_file=$2
    
    echo -e "\nðŸ¤– Stopping ${name}..."
    
    if [ -f "$pid_file" ]; then
        PID=$(cat "$pid_file")
        if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}ðŸ“ Killing process ${PID}...${NC}"
            kill $PID
            sleep 2
            
            # Force kill if still running
            if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
                echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  Process still running, forcing...${NC}"
                kill -9 $PID
            fi
            
            rm -f "$pid_file"
            echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} stopped${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  PID file exists but process not running${NC}"
            rm -f "$pid_file"
        fi
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  No PID file found for ${name}${NC}"
    fi
}

# Function to stop agent by port
stop_agent_port() {
    local name=$1
    local port=$2
    
    echo -e "\nðŸ¤– Stopping ${name} on port ${port}..."
    
    # Find process using the port
    PID=$(lsof -ti:$port -sTCP:LISTEN)
    
    if [ ! -z "$PID" ]; then
        echo -e "${YELLOW}ðŸ“ Found process ${PID} on port ${port}${NC}"
        kill $PID
        sleep 2
        
        # Force kill if still running
        if lsof -ti:$port -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  Process still running, forcing...${NC}"
            kill -9 $PID
        fi
        
        echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} stopped${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  No process found on port ${port}${NC}"
    fi
}

# Stop HelloWorld Agent
echo -e "\nðŸ“ Checking HelloWorld Agent..."
if [ -f "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/helloworld/HelloWorld.pid" ]; then
    stop_agent_pid "HelloWorld" "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/helloworld/HelloWorld.pid"
else
    stop_agent_port "HelloWorld" 9999
fi

# Stop Turso Agent
echo -e "\nðŸ“ Checking Turso Agent..."
if [ -f "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/turso/Turso.pid" ]; then
    stop_agent_pid "Turso" "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/turso/Turso.pid"
else
    stop_agent_port "Turso" 4243
fi

# Stop Marvin Agent
echo -e "\nðŸ“ Checking Marvin Agent..."
if [ -f "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/marvin/Marvin.pid" ]; then
    stop_agent_pid "Marvin" "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/marvin/Marvin.pid"
else
    stop_agent_port "Marvin" 10030
fi

# Stop CrewAI Orchestrator Agent
echo -e "\nðŸ“ Checking CrewAI Orchestrator Agent..."
if [ -f "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/crewai-mkt/CrewAI-Orchestrator.pid" ]; then
    stop_agent_pid "CrewAI-Orchestrator" "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/crewai-mkt/CrewAI-Orchestrator.pid"
else
    stop_agent_port "CrewAI-Orchestrator" 8000
fi

# Stop CrewAI Copywriter Agent
echo -e "\nðŸ“ Checking CrewAI Copywriter Agent..."
if [ -f "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/crewai-mkt/CrewAI-Copywriter.pid" ]; then
    stop_agent_pid "CrewAI-Copywriter" "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/crewai-mkt/CrewAI-Copywriter.pid"
else
    stop_agent_port "CrewAI-Copywriter" 8001
fi

# Stop any other Python processes that might be agents
echo -e "\nðŸ” Looking for other agent processes..."

# Kill any remaining app.py or server.py processes
APP_PIDS=$(pgrep -f "python.*app.py")
if [ ! -z "$APP_PIDS" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}ðŸ“ Found app.py processes: ${APP_PIDS}${NC}"
    kill $APP_PIDS
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Stopped app.py processes${NC}"
fi

SERVER_PIDS=$(pgrep -f "python.*server.py")
if [ ! -z "$SERVER_PIDS" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}ðŸ“ Found server.py processes: ${SERVER_PIDS}${NC}"
    kill $SERVER_PIDS
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Stopped server.py processes${NC}"
fi

# Clean up log files automatically
echo -e "\nðŸ§¹ Cleaning up log files..."
echo -e "${YELLOW}ðŸ“ Removing log files...${NC}"
rm -f /Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/helloworld/*.log 2>/dev/null
rm -f /Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/turso/*.log 2>/dev/null
rm -f /Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/marvin/*.log 2>/dev/null
rm -f /Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/crewai-mkt/*.log 2>/dev/null
rm -f *.log 2>/dev/null
echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Log files cleaned${NC}"

# Verify all agents are stopped
echo -e "\nðŸ” Verifying shutdown..."
sleep 2

RUNNING=false

# Check ports
if lsof -ti:9999 -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port 9999 still in use${NC}"
    RUNNING=true
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port 9999 is free${NC}"
fi

if lsof -ti:4243 -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port 4243 still in use${NC}"
    RUNNING=true
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port 4243 is free${NC}"
fi

if lsof -ti:10030 -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port 10030 still in use${NC}"
    RUNNING=true
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port 10030 is free${NC}"
fi

if lsof -ti:8000 -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port 8000 still in use${NC}"
    RUNNING=true
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port 8000 is free${NC}"
fi

if lsof -ti:8001 -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port 8001 still in use${NC}"
    RUNNING=true
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port 8001 is free${NC}"
fi

# Summary
echo -e "\nðŸŽ¯ Shutdown Summary:"
echo "==================="

if [ "$RUNNING" = false ]; then
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… All agents successfully stopped${NC}"
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… All ports are free${NC}"
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… System ready for restart${NC}"
else
    echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  Some processes may still be running${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}   Use 'lsof -i:PORT' to check specific ports${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}   Use 'ps aux | grep python' to find remaining processes${NC}"
fi

echo -e "\nðŸ’¡ Management Commands:"
echo "   â€¢ Start all: ./start_all_agents.sh"
echo "   â€¢ Check ports: lsof -i:9999,4243,10030"
echo "   â€¢ Force kill all: pkill -9 -f 'python.*app.py|python.*server.py'"
echo "   â€¢ View processes: ps aux | grep python"

echo -e "\n${GREEN}ðŸ›‘ A2A Agent Ecosystem shutdown complete!${NC}"

#!/bin/bash
# A2A Agent Shutdown Script
# Stops all running A2A agents with standardized structure

echo "ðŸ›‘ Stopping A2A Agent Ecosystem..."
echo "=================================="

# Colors for output
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
RED='\033[0;31m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Base directory
BASE_DIR="/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou"

# Function to stop agent
stop_agent() {
    local name=$1
    local dir=$2
    local port=$3
    
    echo -e "\nðŸ›‘ Stopping ${name}..."
    
    # Check for PID file in standardized location
    PID_FILE="$BASE_DIR/$dir/logs/${name}.pid"
    
    if [ -f "$PID_FILE" ]; then
        PID=$(cat "$PID_FILE")
        
        if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}   Stopping process ${PID}...${NC}"
            kill $PID
            
            # Wait for graceful shutdown
            sleep 2
            
            # Force kill if still running
            if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
                echo -e "${YELLOW}   Force stopping process ${PID}...${NC}"
                kill -9 $PID
            fi
            
            rm -f "$PID_FILE"
            echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} stopped${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  ${name} process not found (cleaning PID file)${NC}"
            rm -f "$PID_FILE"
        fi
    else
        # Try to stop by port
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  No PID file for ${name}, checking port ${port}...${NC}"
        
        PID=$(lsof -ti:$port -sTCP:LISTEN)
        
        if [ ! -z "$PID" ]; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}   Found process ${PID} on port ${port}${NC}"
            kill $PID
            sleep 2
            
            if lsof -ti:$port -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
                kill -9 $PID
            fi
            
            echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} stopped${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${YELLOW}   No ${name} process found${NC}"
        fi
    fi
}

# Stop standardized agents
echo -e "\n${YELLOW}Stopping standardized agents...${NC}"
stop_agent "HelloWorld" "helloworld" 9999
stop_agent "Marvin" "marvin" 9998
stop_agent "Turso" "turso" 7001
stop_agent "A2AEstudo" "a2a-estudo" 8001

# Stop legacy agents
echo -e "\n${YELLOW}Stopping legacy agents...${NC}"
stop_agent "CrewAI-Orchestrator" "crewai-mkt" 8000
stop_agent "CrewAI-Copywriter" "crewai-mkt" 8002

#!/bin/bash
# A2A Agent Shutdown Script
# Stops all running A2A agents with standardized structure

echo "ðŸ›‘ Stopping A2A Agent Ecosystem..."
echo "=================================="

# Colors for output
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
RED='\033[0;31m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Base directory
BASE_DIR="/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou"

# Function to stop agent
stop_agent() {
    local name=$1
    local dir=$2
    local port=$3
    
    echo -e "\nðŸ›‘ Stopping ${name}..."
    
    # Check for PID file in standardized location
    PID_FILE="$BASE_DIR/$dir/logs/${name}.pid"
    
    if [ -f "$PID_FILE" ]; then
        PID=$(cat "$PID_FILE")
        
        if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}   Stopping process ${PID}...${NC}"
            kill $PID
            
            # Wait for graceful shutdown
            sleep 2
            
            # Force kill if still running
            if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
                echo -e "${YELLOW}   Force stopping process ${PID}...${NC}"
                kill -9 $PID
            fi
            
            rm -f "$PID_FILE"
            echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} stopped${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  ${name} process not found (cleaning PID file)${NC}"
            rm -f "$PID_FILE"
        fi
    else
        # Try to stop by port
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  No PID file for ${name}, checking port ${port}...${NC}"
        
        PID=$(lsof -ti:$port -sTCP:LISTEN)
        
        if [ ! -z "$PID" ]; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}   Found process ${PID} on port ${port}${NC}"
            kill $PID
            sleep 2
            
            if lsof -ti:$port -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
                kill -9 $PID
            fi
            
            echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} stopped${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${YELLOW}   No ${name} process found${NC}"
        fi
    fi
}

# Stop standardized agents
echo -e "\n${YELLOW}Stopping standardized agents...${NC}"
stop_agent "HelloWorld" "helloworld" 9999
stop_agent "Marvin" "marvin" 9998
stop_agent "Turso" "turso" 7001

# Stop legacy agents
echo -e "\n${YELLOW}Stopping legacy agents...${NC}"
stop_agent "CrewAI-Orchestrator" "crewai-mkt" 8000

# Stops all running A2A agents gracefully

echo "ðŸ›‘ Stopping A2A Agent Ecosystem..."
echo "=================================="

# Colors for output
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
RED='\033[0;31m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Function to stop agent using PID file
stop_agent_pid() {

            fi

        fi
    else

    fi
}

# Function to stop agent by port
stop_agent_port() {
    local name=$1

        if lsof -ti:$port -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  Process still running, forcing...${NC}"
            kill -9 $PID
        fi
        
        echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} stopped${NC}"
    else
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  No process found on port ${port}${NC}"

}

    stop_agent_pid "Marvin" "/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/marvin/Marvin.pid"
else

fi

echo -e "\nðŸ” Verifying shutdown..."
sleep 2

RUNNING=false

# Check ports
if lsof -ti:9999 -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port 9999 still in use${NC}"
    RUNNING=true
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port 9999 is free${NC}"
fi

if lsof -ti:4243 -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then

    RUNNING=true
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port 10030 is free${NC}"
fi

if lsof -ti:8000 -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port 8000 still in use${NC}"
    RUNNING=true
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port 8000 is free${NC}"
fi

if lsof -ti:8001 -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port 8001 still in use${NC}"
    RUNNING=true
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port 8001 is free${NC}"
fi

# Summary
echo -e "\nðŸŽ¯ Shutdown Summary:"
echo "==================="

if [ "$RUNNING" = false ]; then
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… All agents successfully stopped${NC}"
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… All ports are free${NC}"
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… System ready for restart${NC}"
else
    echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  Some processes may still be running${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}   Use 'lsof -i:PORT' to check specific ports${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}   Use 'ps aux | grep python' to find remaining processes${NC}"
fi

echo -e "\nðŸ’¡ Management Commands:"
echo "   â€¢ Start all: ./start_all_agents.sh"
echo "   â€¢ Check ports: lsof -i:9999,4243,10030"
echo "   â€¢ Force kill all: pkill -9 -f 'python.*app.py|python.*server.py'"
echo "   â€¢ View processes: ps aux | grep python"

echo -e "\n${GREEN}ðŸ›‘ A2A Agent Ecosystem shutdown complete!${NC}"

#!/bin/bash
# A2A Agent Shutdown Script
# Stops all running A2A agents with standardized structure

echo "ðŸ›‘ Stopping A2A Agent Ecosystem..."
echo "=================================="

# Colors for output
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
RED='\033[0;31m'
NC='\033[0m' # No Color

# Base directory
BASE_DIR="/Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou"

# Function to stop agent
stop_agent() {
    local name=$1
    local dir=$2
    local port=$3
    
    echo -e "\nðŸ›‘ Stopping ${name}..."
    
    # Check for PID file in standardized location
    PID_FILE="$BASE_DIR/$dir/logs/${name}.pid"
    
    if [ -f "$PID_FILE" ]; then
        PID=$(cat "$PID_FILE")
        
        if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}   Stopping process ${PID}...${NC}"
            kill $PID
            
            # Wait for graceful shutdown
            sleep 2
            
            # Force kill if still running
            if ps -p $PID > /dev/null 2>&1; then
                echo -e "${YELLOW}   Force stopping process ${PID}...${NC}"
                kill -9 $PID
            fi
            
            rm -f "$PID_FILE"
            echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} stopped${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  ${name} process not found (cleaning PID file)${NC}"
            rm -f "$PID_FILE"
        fi
    else
        # Try to stop by port
        echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  No PID file for ${name}, checking port ${port}...${NC}"
        
        PID=$(lsof -ti:$port -sTCP:LISTEN)
        
        if [ ! -z "$PID" ]; then
            echo -e "${YELLOW}   Found process ${PID} on port ${port}${NC}"
            kill $PID
            sleep 2
            
            if lsof -ti:$port -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
                kill -9 $PID
            fi
            
            echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… ${name} stopped${NC}"
        else
            echo -e "${YELLOW}   No ${name} process found${NC}"
        fi
    fi
}

# Stop standardized agents
echo -e "\n${YELLOW}Stopping standardized agents...${NC}"
stop_agent "HelloWorld" "helloworld" 9999
stop_agent "Marvin" "marvin" 9998
stop_agent "Turso" "turso" 7001
stop_agent "A2AEstudo" "a2a-estudo" 8001

# Stop legacy agents
echo -e "\n${YELLOW}Stopping legacy agents...${NC}"
stop_agent "CrewAI-Orchestrator" "crewai-mkt" 8000
stop_agent "CrewAI-Copywriter" "crewai-mkt" 8002

# Stop any other Python processes that might be agents
echo -e "\nðŸ” Looking for other agent processes..."

# Kill any remaining app.py or server.py processes
APP_PIDS=$(pgrep -f "python.*app.py")
if [ ! -z "$APP_PIDS" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}ðŸ“ Found app.py processes: ${APP_PIDS}${NC}"
    kill $APP_PIDS
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Stopped app.py processes${NC}"
fi

SERVER_PIDS=$(pgrep -f "python.*server.py")
if [ ! -z "$SERVER_PIDS" ]; then
    echo -e "${YELLOW}ðŸ“ Found server.py processes: ${SERVER_PIDS}${NC}"
    kill $SERVER_PIDS
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Stopped server.py processes${NC}"
fi

# Clean up log files automatically
echo -e "\nðŸ§¹ Cleaning up log files..."
echo -e "${YELLOW}ðŸ“ Removing log files...${NC}"
rm -f /Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/helloworld/*.log 2>/dev/null
rm -f /Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/turso/*.log 2>/dev/null
rm -f /Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/marvin/*.log 2>/dev/null
rm -f /Users/agents/Desktop/claude-20x/agents-a2a/.conductor/hangzhou/crewai-mkt/*.log 2>/dev/null
rm -f *.log 2>/dev/null
echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Log files cleaned${NC}"

# Verify all agents are stopped
echo -e "\nðŸ” Verifying shutdown..."
sleep 2

RUNNING=false

# Check ports
if lsof -ti:9999 -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port 9999 still in use${NC}"
    RUNNING=true
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port 9999 is free${NC}"
fi

if lsof -ti:4243 -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port 4243 still in use${NC}"
    RUNNING=true
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port 4243 is free${NC}"
fi

if lsof -ti:10030 -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port 10030 still in use${NC}"
    RUNNING=true
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port 10030 is free${NC}"
fi

if lsof -ti:8000 -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port 8000 still in use${NC}"
    RUNNING=true
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port 8000 is free${NC}"
fi

if lsof -ti:8001 -sTCP:LISTEN > /dev/null 2>&1; then
    echo -e "${RED}âŒ Port 8001 still in use${NC}"
    RUNNING=true
else
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… Port 8001 is free${NC}"
fi

# Summary
echo -e "\nðŸŽ¯ Shutdown Summary:"
echo "==================="

if [ "$RUNNING" = false ]; then
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… All agents successfully stopped${NC}"
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… All ports are free${NC}"
    echo -e "${GREEN}âœ… System ready for restart${NC}"
else
    echo -e "${YELLOW}âš ï¸  Some processes may still be running${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}   Use 'lsof -i:PORT' to check specific ports${NC}"
    echo -e "${YELLOW}   Use 'ps aux | grep python' to find remaining processes${NC}"
fi

echo -e "\nðŸ’¡ Management Commands:"
echo "   â€¢ Start all: ./start_all_agents.sh"
echo "   â€¢ Check ports: lsof -i:9999,4243,10030"
echo "   â€¢ Force kill all: pkill -9 -f 'python.*app.py|python.*server.py'"
echo "   â€¢ View processes: ps aux | grep python"

echo -e "\n${GREEN}ðŸ›‘ A2A Agent Ecosystem shutdown complete!${NC}"
